about_the_game:
STORY

When the self-proclaimed "best secret agent in the world" starts his week-long holiday, he is anticipation nothing more than a simple hiking holiday with a grizzled guide up an unnamed mountain. Unfortunately for him, his enemies decided that would be far too boring...

DETAILS

This is a very short, comedic TEST visual novel, designed as a test for both writing visual novels (originally with VN Maker and then Ren'Py) and dealing with Steamworks, as well as being used as a testbed for anything new.

Features include :

  • Visit Chichester (not personally though)
  • The ability to give your character a name! Wow!
  • Comedy
  • Quirky characters
  • Internal achievements
  • Spanish and Italian language support (minus a few small things). This has been provided by Daniele Ferrari
  • Non-tested Mac version included

Features music by Kevin MacLeod (Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0) and some graphics from Pexels

The program can be found in "WTC 1\Test Projects"

fullgame.name: Welcome To... Chichester 1/Redux : The Spy Of America And The Long Vacation

legal_notice:
Music by Josh Woodward.
Sound effects : "Let's Play with Free Sound Effects"
Additional music licensed from Pond5

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 or later
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Version: 10.6+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only) or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible

name: Welcome To... Chichester : Episode 0

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 upwards
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX / OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any Windows compatible ones
